changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE APP_USER ( ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, FIRST_NAME VARCHAR2(200) NOT NULL, LAST_NAME VARCHAR2(200), EMAIL VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, USER_NAME VARCHAR2(255), PASSWORD VARCHAR2(255), IS_ENABLED NUMBER(1) DEFAULT 1, IS_CREDENTIALS_NON_EXPIRED NUMBER(1) DEFAULT 1, IS_ACCOUNT_NON_LOCKED NUMBER(1) DEFAULT 1, IS_ACCOUNT_NON_EXPIRED NUMBER(1) DEFAULT 1, CREATED_BY VARCHAR2(255), CREATED_DATE DATE, CREATED_BY_ID NUMBER(10), LAST_MODIFIED_BY_ID NUMBER(10), LAST_MODIFIED_DATE DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY VARCHAR2(255), PRIMARY KEY (ID), CONSTRAINT EMAIL_UK UNIQUE (EMAIL), CONSTRAINT USER_NAME_UK UNIQUE (USER_NAME) );
CREATE SEQUENCE APP_USER_SEQ MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 NOCACHE NOCYCLE;
